SELECT SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL.SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL_ID , SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL.SI_ALLOWANCE_ID , SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL.MS_SENIN_ID , SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL.MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL.ALLOWANCE , SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL.IS_TARGET , SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL.SI_CARD_ID , SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL.DELETE_FLAG , SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL.SEND_FLAG , SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL.VESSEL_ID , SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL.DATA_NO , SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL.USER_KEY , SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL.RENEW_DATE , SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL.RENEW_USER_ID , SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL.TS ,
SI_CARD.MS_VESSEL_ID
FROM SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL
LEFT JOIN SI_CARD ON SI_CARD.SI_CARD_ID = SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL.SI_CARD_ID
WHERE SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL.DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND SI_ALLOWANCE_ID = :SI_ALLOWANCE_ID

INSERT INTO SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL( SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL_ID , SI_ALLOWANCE_ID , MS_SENIN_ID , MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , ALLOWANCE , IS_TARGET , SI_CARD_ID , DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL_ID , :SI_ALLOWANCE_ID , :MS_SENIN_ID , :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , :ALLOWANCE , :IS_TARGET , :SI_CARD_ID , :DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL SET SI_ALLOWANCE_ID = :SI_ALLOWANCE_ID , MS_SENIN_ID = :MS_SENIN_ID , MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID = :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID , ALLOWANCE = :ALLOWANCE , IS_TARGET = :IS_TARGET , SI_CARD_ID = :SI_CARD_ID , DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS WHERE SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL_ID = :SI_ALLOWANCE_DETAIL_ID AND TS = :TS
